column4: running 11.04, how do i install a theme found on gnome-look.org? noob to linux
depends on what the theme is for.
could be a gnome shell theme, or a gtk2, or gtk3 theme.. the webupd8 blog site has a PPA setup with a lot of differnt themes.  plus guides on using them
i thinkyou are refering to the ICS gnome-shell theme. which is in the webupd8 ppa.
